sentences: Two albums Special Forces (2004) and Our New Quarters (2007) followed but for the past few years he's recorded primarily for film and TV. His ethereal perspective evokes the sounds of Sigur RÃ³s and The Flaming Lips whilst his musical range compares to that of Boards Of Canada and Mercury Rev, a true reflection of his skills behind the big screen.
In 2013 Julian signed with Lewis Recordings.
Julian provided the keyboards on the "Daylight For Delay" EP by Astoria.
